page.title: 03POPULATION
page.content: The population of Oswaldtwistle is decreasing. There was a low birth rate about 5 years ago which has carried on till now. There are now 78,862 peoploe living in Hyndburn (We have no broken down statistics for Oswaldtwistle) and 72,269 of these were born here in England. 3600 were born outside the United Kingdom, which means that another 2,993 people were born in the rest of the United Kingdom. l,4l6 people were born in Scotland, 779 people were born in Northern Ireland and 394 were born in Wales and the rest are from smaller islands. The male/female breakdown for Hyndburn shows that there are more females than males in Hyndburn. There are 40,60l females in Hyndburn, compared with 38,26l males.
